name: Hopeless (Abdulrahman Ahmed, seydiss, merved)
description:
The game takes place in a house environment with dark theme. It is a platform game. The player tries to reach the picture frames at the end of the levels to find his parents. However one should be aware of the obstacles to not go insane. The player gets into the picture.
